ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var n=result.match(/\d*\/(\d+)页\</)[1];
var list=[{k:'第1页',v:baseUrl}];
for(var i=2;i<=n;i++){
list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:baseUrl.replace(/\.txt/,'.txt&yeshu='+i)});
}
list
</js>
